data.description:
Game Notes: Compact, water and windproof, six pockets, reversible, camouflage poncho for individual environments (forest, desert, etc).

Adds +1D to sneak, +2D at ranges of more than 30+ meters or if the wearer remains motionless. Furthermore it breaks up the wearer's bio-signature increasing sensor difficulty skill checks by +10. A character wounded while wearing the poncho has its overall effectiveness reduced by -1 pip. If heavily damaged the effectiveness is reduced by -1D and the bio-signature difficulty modifier is reduced to -5.
data.label: OD6S.CHAR_GEAR
